title: Logics of certain people explained!
body:
_Player A, player B & player C happens to play a game, til they ran into certain situations:_

**A 4v5 teamfight which is about to start whilst the 5th guy is still otw:**

A: Let's try get caught out & blame the 5th guy!
B: Holee shit, that's so smart!
C: Super smart!

**The 5th guy is having a bad game & has a bad performance, even though he's still trying his best:**

A: Better talk shit on him! That'll help him get him on his feet back!
B: Omg, why didn't I think of that...?
C: Incredible!!

**Player A is playing an unfed Riven, and her top lane is filled with enemy fed top, fed jungle & fed mid, and her teammates are nowhere near her:**

A: Better 1v3 them!
B: Wisest words NA!
C: Woah, that's brilliant!

**Player A plays an immobile AP Support with no Sightstone, and has been ganked dead by enemy jungler for 10 times:**

A: Better rush Deathcap! That'll help me escape ganks better!
B: That's genius!
C: Super genius!

**50 minutes mark, everyone's Level 18, enemy team is on full HP & Player A's team is half HP"**

A: Let's do Baron now!
B: Omg, Im so prepared for this!
C: Incredible!!

replies.body: the truth is by spreading this idea you are inherently making it worse, toxicity can only breed toxicity.

99% of people think this.
99% of people are toxic.
Therefore, every player who has this thought process is toxic.

IT'S TRUE BECAUSE I EXPERIENCED IT OVER AND OVER AGAIN.
